name: Spread of Imagination
description:
Looks like your grandma is gloomy today… It’s time to make her life brighter with the power of child imagination! Turn ordinary objects into toys and keep the fun spreading! (This is a prototype of our first game, it doesn’t have ending yet)

Gameplay:

Point and click onto the ordinary boring objects to change them into something more fun. The happiness bar shows how far you are from completing the level. If you can't change the object, try another one, maybe you need to be more happy to use your imagination on something big yet!

Authors:

  • Xnum - Programming, Level configuration
  • george-osh - Music composition, Sound design
  • sleepykokozoko - Visual asset creation, Art, Level design
  • khelekdor - Plot, Narrative design
